content: this crochet moon pillow pattern is perfect for snuggling or having on a shelf for a little extra celestial decor have it on your couch during october or leave it out all year round - it s perfect for any celestial occasion **materials** ▢yarn colors any skein of yellow ▢5mm crochet hook ▢tapestry needle ▢polyfill **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase 2 stitches in the same stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet
